text: Valencia C.F. is a football team in Spain. == Title == * La Liga : 6 ** 1941/42, 1943/44, 1946/47, 1970/71, 2001/02, 2003/04 * Copa del Rey : 6 ** 1941, 1949, 1954, 1967, 1979, 1999 * Spain Supercup : 2 ** 1949, 1999 * Europepokal of the Pokalwinners : 1 ** 1980 * UEFA-Cup : 3 ** 1962, 1963, 2004 * Europe Supercup : 2 ** 1980, 2004 * UI-Cup : 1 ** 1998 == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 La Liga 5th 2001/02 La Liga Champions 2002/03 La Liga 5th 2003/04 La Liga Champions 2004/05 La Liga 7th 2005/06 La Liga 3rd 2006/07 La Liga 4th 2007/08 La Liga 10th 2008/09 La Liga 6th === Former position === == Player == Goalkeeper: * 25 - Ludovic Butelle (since 2004) Defence: * 02 - Luís Miguel Brito Garcia Monteiro (since 2005) * 03 - Asier del Horno Cosgaya (since 2006) * 05 - Carlos Marchena López (since 2001) * 17 - David Navarro Pedrós (since 2001) * 20 - Raúl Albiol Tortajada (since 2003) * 23 - Cristóbal Emilio Torres Ruiz, called "Curro Torres" (since 2001) * 24 - Emiliano Moretti (since 2004) * 26 - David Cerrajería Rubio * 29 - David Córcoles Alcaraz Midfield: * 06 - David Albelda Aliques (captain) (since 1997) * 08 - Rubén Baraja Vegas (since 2000) * 11 - Mario Ignacio Regueiro Pintos (since 2005) * 14 - Vicente Rodríguez Guillén (since 2000) * 15 - Joaquín Sánchez Rodríguez (since 2006) * 16 - Hugo Miguel Ferreira Viana (since 2005) * 18 - Jorge López Montaña (since 2003) * 19 - Jaime Gavilán Martínez (since 2006) * 21 - David Jiménez Silva (back since 2006) * 22 - Eduardo César Daud Gaspar, called "Edu" (since 2005) * 30 - Nacho Insa Bohigues (since 2006) * 31 - Miguel Pallardó González Attack: * 07 - David Villa Sánchez (since 2005) * 09 - Fernando Morientes Sánchez (since 2006) * 10 - Miguel Ángel Angulo Valderrey (since 1997) * 34 - Javier Guerra Rodriguez (since 2006) ==References== Category:Spanish football clubs Category:Valencia Category:1919 establishments in Europe Category:1910s establishments in Spain
title: Valencia CF
